original_text: You bring out the groups of stars for people to see at different times of the year. You cannot put the stars of the Great Bear and the Little Bear in their right places in the sky. 38: Pleiades, Orion, the Great Bear and the Little Bear are groups of stars. You bring out the groups of stars for people to see at different times of the year. You cannot put the stars of the Great Bear and the Little Bear in their right places in the sky. 38: Pleiades, Orion, the Great Bear and the Little Bear are groups of stars. You bring out the groups of stars for people to see at different times of the year. You cannot put the stars of the Great Bear and the Little Bear in their right places in the sky. 38: Pleiades, Orion, the Great Bear and the Little Bear are groups of stars. You bring out the groups of stars
korean_text: 너는 별자리들을 각각 제 때에 이끌어 낼 수 있으며 북두성을 다른 별들에게로 이끌어 갈 수 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Pleiades, Orion, the Great Bear and the Little Bear are groups of stars.
sentences.korean_translation: 플레이아데스, 오리온, 큰곰자리와 작은곰자리는 별 무리입니다.

sentences.original_text: You bring out the groups of stars
for people to see at different times of the year.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 일년 중 다른 시간에 볼 수 있도록.

sentences.original_text: You cannot put the stars of the Great Bear and the Little Bear
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 큰곰자리와 작은곰자리의 별들을 놓을 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: in their right places in the sky.
